00014 // .NAME vtkMrmlCrossSectionNode - MRML node to represent the properties of a cross section
00015 // .SECTION Description
00016 // CrossSection node describe the properties of the three slices that are
00017 // displayed on the screen. Therefore, the position of a cross section must
00018 // currently be 0, 1 or 2.
00019

00037   // Utility Functions

00070   // Rotation Y

00084   vtkGetMacro(InModel,int);
00085

00087   // Background volume

00089   vtkGetStringMacro(BackVolRefID);

00104   vtkGetStringMacro(ClipType);

00107   // Clipping state
